title: Journalists talk about the elephant in the room: our relationship with Big Tech
description: “Journalists are souring on social media platforms”, wrote Jacob L. Nelson and Gregory P. Perreault in a recent article on changes in Nieman Lab predictions over time. While early predictions “placed a great deal of faith in social media platforms to aid journalists in their mission to monetize and engage with audiences,” the authors say,...
